title: League shuts off my computer
body: I have played league since season 5 and this is the first time i have had this issue, my computer shuts off if im not in loading screen when the game starts. So if i am in google chrome and i exit it and click on league when i hear the game start the window opens but as soon as it opens my whole computer shuts off and goes into sleep mode and i have to turn off the power supply and turn in back on. No it is not overheating, temps are low before i opened league window. Help appreciated thanks. i mean i could play if i just stay in loading screen but it is a bit annoying have to wait in loading screen and not being able to be on youtube or facebook :p

replies.body: Thanks for the reply, yeah i totally didnt think about that im pretty thats what it is thank you very much :)

It sounds like your power supply may be going bad. When switching between processes, there would be a rather large spike in power usage, which could trip out a failing power supply. I would suggest getting it tested or temporarily swapping in a known good one to see if you notice any change.

Let me know if you notice any changes.
